message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and quality, I believe it's worth more than $100. Considering its worth to you is $120, let me start by offering it to you for $110. Looking forward to your response!
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the quality of the product, $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $105. Let's see if we can find some common ground.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet somewhere in the middle. My counteroffer for the product is $107.50. I hope this proposal works for you.
